Name: Zoning, 1417 Avenue U Rezoning, Brooklyn (C 250332 ZMK).
Title: Application number C 250332 ZMK (1417 Avenue U Rezoning) submitted by 1417 Avenue U Holding LLC, pursuant to Sections 197-c and 201 of the New York City Charter for an amendment of the Zoning Map, Section Nos. 28c and 29a, eliminating from within an R5 District a C1-3 District, changing from an R5 District to an R7A District, and establishing within the proposed R7A District a C2-4 District, Borough of Brooklyn, Community District 15, Council District 48.

History.Description: This Land Use Application was Introduced by Council
